scripts.build: npm run prebuild && nest build -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && nest build -p tsconfig.prod.json
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop LOG_LEVEL=info nest start --watch | pino-pretty
scripts.start:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=develop LOG_LEVEL=trace nest start --debug | pino-pretty --singleLine
